https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rLX1Uie7cRwAZjjG33lirfXCxwC.jpg Burned by the desire to avenge her dead boyfriend, a Japanese woman learns to shoot a gun, and goes after the local Mafia in Taiwan. Mizuno Miki excels in her role as the grieving and estranged, then vengeful and cold-blooded foreigner. A Chance to Die
